title: Perform a PPE Audit
description: A safety officer performs a random audit in the terminal to ensure all workers are wearing the correct Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).

tasks.description: Observe a work area (e.g., the quay) and check if workers are wearing hard hats, safety vests, and steel-toed boots.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer observes the area and the workers.

tasks.description: Identify a worker who is not wearing their hard hat.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer spots a violation of the PPE policy.

tasks.description: Approach the worker, instruct them to stop work and put on their hard hat, and log the safety violation.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer corrects the unsafe behavior and logs the event for reporting and trend analysis.
